line.text: In the old age black was not counted fair
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or if it were it bore not beauty name
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But now is black beauty successive heir
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And beauty slandered with a bastard shame
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For since each hand hath put on nature power
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Fairing the foul with art false borrowed face
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Sweet beauty hath no name no holy bower
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But is profaned if not lives in disgrace
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Therefore my mistress eyes are raven black
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Her eyes so suited and they mourners seem
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: At such who not born fair no beauty lack
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Slandering creation with a false esteem
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Yet so they mourn becoming of their woe
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That every tongue says beauty should look so
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
